paper_abstract: We show several concrete attacks on an authenticated encryption (AE) scheme PAE, which appeared in the IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INFORMATION THEORY, vol. 56, no. 8, pp. 4025-4037. In addition, we show some flaws and oversights in the analysis (presented in the same paper) used to prove PAE to be a secure AE scheme.
paper_title: Attacks on the Authenticated Encryption Mode of Operation PAE
